channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I am a 65-year-old single woman with 25 credit cards. How do I cancel them without hurting my credit score?
item.description: “I pay them off each month if I use them and don’t run a balance.”

item.title: Is the stock market open tomorrow for Labor Day? Does the post office deliver mail?
item.description: The end-of-summer holiday is upon us, so be prepared for plenty of closings.

item.title: We’re in our 70s and have $1.4 million. We pay $1,750 in rent. Will we run out of money in retirement?
item.description: “Our adjusted gross income was $160,000 last year. We both also have fairly good health insurance..”

item.title: My friend, 61, signed a $20K contract for dental implants. She can’t afford it. Can she fight it?
item.description: “After her room and board is paid at the assisted-living home, she has $9,000 left for the year.”

item.title: ‘I’m asking for a friend’: Will the IRS write off $60,000 lost in a romance phishing scam?
item.description: “The bank did try to stop them from executing the transfers.”

item.title: This Chinese property stock is defying the slump and poised to soar, Barclays predicts
item.description: One Chinese property company is not only defying the market slump but also returning money to shareholders.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts recommend these 3 stocks for long-term investors
item.description: TipRanks' ranking service highlights three stocks favored by top flight analysts, including Palo Alto Networks and MongoDB.

item.title: Look at global banks and gold miners as strong picks, Lazard portfolio manager says
item.description: Lazard Asset Management is finding opportunities in several European and Asian banks, chipmakers and global gold miners.

item.title: Bitcoin dominance could return in September as crypto traders await Fed decision

item.title: Elliott sees opportunities to create value at warehouse REIT Rexford Industrial
item.description: Rexford's premium assets, its consolidation in the REIT industry and discounted valuation makes the company a natural acquisition candidate.
